message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $100. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I can offer the product to you for $105. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering its value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from being comfortable with the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're still trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer the product to you for $102.50. This is my final offer, as I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to make one final offer: $98. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're frustrated, but I'm still not willing to pay that much. I was thinking more along the lines of $88. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
